project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts, while storing the data in a JSON file and interacting with the users through the terminal.

task.name: Implement functionality to add a contact
Implement functionality to search for a contact
Implement functionality to update a contact
Implement functionality to delete a contact
Implement functionality to read contacts from a JSON file
Implement functionality to write contacts to a JSON file
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they function correctly
